entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to periods of snow in the evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Snow level 1800 metres lowering to valley bottom in the evening. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
